textarea.value: To manually schedule a recording, enter a title (optional). Then set the channel, date, start time, and duration of your recording. Note that this recording will not have any listings data or other information provided by an EPG.

textarea.value: To give greater or lesser priority to a channel in your lineup, select it from the list. To increase the channel's priority, press the right arrow. To decrease its priority, press the left arrow.

textarea.name: helparea
textarea.value: To create a custom priority rule, enter a name and priority adjustment. You can them select from existing priority templates or create one of your own using SQL syntax in the "Clause SQL" edit box.\n\nOnce you have completed your rule, can can Test, Delete, or Install it right away.
